head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FOOKS, JOSEPH M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FOOKS, JOSEPH M.

block.p: FOOKS-Joseph M., Rev., of Paterson, NJ. Beloved husband of Marcia (Rubins). Devoted father of Janet Wilder and Risha Saperstein. Dear brother of Fanny Fooks. Loving grandfather of Ari Saperstein, Perry Saperstein, Shira Perlman, Barry Hirschman and Gayle Alter. Cherished great-grandfather of Cheryl and Deena Alter. Services Sunday 10:00AM at Mt. Moria Cemetery, Fairview, NJ. For information call Wien & Wien, 1-800322-0533.
